home_page.slieder_heading: Discover, collect, and sell extraordinary NFTs
home_page.slieder_subheading: TF-NFT-Marketplace is the world's first and largest NFT marketplace

get_started.heading: Get Started Creating & Selling Your NFTs

set_up_your_wallet.title: Set up your wallet
set_up_your_wallet.text: Once youâ€™ve set up your wallet of choice, connect it to TF-NFT-marketplace by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner. Learn about the wallets we support.

create_your_collection.title: Create your collection
create_your_collection.text: Click My Collections and set up your collection. Add social links, a description, profile & banner images, and set a secondary sales fee.

add_your_nfts.title: Add your NFTs
add_your_nfts.text: Upload your work (image, video, audio, or 3D art), add a title and description, and customize your NFTs with properties, stats, and unlockable content.

list_them_for_sale.title: List them for sale
list_them_for_sale.text: Choose between auctions, fixed-price listings, and declining-price listings. You choose how you want to sell your NFTs, and we help you sell them!
